mapper.select: select r.rcu_b_no, r.title, r.content, r.reg_dt, r.view_cnt, m.memb_no mno, m.name mname, p.pups_no pno, p.name pname, a.act_local_no ano, a.name aname from gms_recruit r inner join gms_memb m on r.memb_no=m.memb_no inner join gms_activelocal a on r.act_local_no=a.act_local_no inner join gms_purpose p on p.pups_no=r.pups_no order by r.rcu_b_no desc

select r.rcu_b_no, r.title, r.content, r.reg_dt, r.view_cnt, m.memb_no mno, m.name mname, p.pups_no pno, p.name pname, a.act_local_no ano, a.name aname from gms_recruit r inner join gms_memb m on r.memb_no=m.memb_no inner join gms_activelocal a on r.act_local_no=a.act_local_no inner join gms_purpose p on p.pups_no=r.pups_no where r.rcu_b_no=#{no}

작성자 이름으로 조회 select r.rcu_b_no, r.title, r.content, r.reg_dt, r.view_cnt, r.act_local_no, r.pups_no, m.memb_no, m.name from gms_recruit r left outer join gms_memb m on r.memb_no = m.memb_no where m.name=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_recruit(title, content, act_local_no, pups_no, memb_no) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{activeLocal.no}, #{purpose.no}, #{member.no})
mapper.update: update gms_recruit set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, act_local_no = #{activeLocal.no}, pups_no = #{purpose.no}, memb_no = #{member.no} where rcu_b_no = #{no}
update gms_recruit set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where rcu_b_no = #{no}
